customProperties.armorEffects: You have resistance to necrotic damage.
customProperties.weaponEffects: This weapon deals an additional 1d4 necrotic damage to celestials and fiends.
customProperties.additionalEffects: You can see normally in darkness, both magical and nonmagical, to a distance of 120 feet.

entries.name: Properties
entries: Forging Conditions: Must be carved under starlight.
Armor Effects: You have resistance to necrotic damage.
Weapon Effects: This weapon deals an additional {@dice 1d4} necrotic damage to celestials and fiends.
Additional Effects: You can see normally in darkness, both magical and nonmagical, to a distance of 120 feet.
